properties.name: Brandon Lynch
properties.circumstances: Officers responded to a call of a physical disturbance. When they encountered the victim they claim he came towards them with an edged weapon. Officers deployed a taser, which they claim didn't work so they then shot and killed the victim.

properties.name: Margaret Dunn
properties.circumstances: Officers were in pursuit of an unrelated suspect when they crashed into the vehicle of the victims (Maggie Dunn, Caroline Gill - both killed, and Liam Dunn - critically injured).

properties.name: James Allandale
properties.agency_responsible: Morris County Sheriff's Office,Denville Police Department,Morristown Police Department
properties.circumstances: The victim was the subject of a search for a previous attempted murder. When officers executed a warrant and breached the motel room, the victim allegedly fired at officers who shot and killed the victim.

properties.name: Caroline Gill
properties.circumstances: Officers were in pursuit of an unrelated suspect when they crashed into the vehicle of the victims (Maggie Dunn, Caroline Gill - both killed, and Liam Dunn - critically injured).

properties.name: Name Withheld
properties.agency_responsible: Muscogee Nation Lighthorse Police,Tulsa Police Department
properties.circumstances: Police attempted a traffic stop and claim the victim fled in his vehicle. They pursued the victim until he stopped his vehicle and allegedly got out with 2 guns. Police claim he refused all commands and they resorted to shooting and killing the victim.

properties.name: Thomas Marshall
properties.circumstances: Officers responded to a call reporting a disabled vehicle. Upon arrival the victim allegedly pointed a weapon at an officer and took his vehicle. Police later performed a stop on that vehicle. The victim then allegedly exited the police cruiser and exchanged shots with officers where he was shot and killed.

properties.name: William Allen Konkol
properties.circumstances: Officers respond to a report of an incident where someone pointed a weapon at another person after a traffic encounter. Police located and attempted a traffic stop on the vehicle of the victim. The driver allegedly fled and later stopped after a pursuit. The victim was shot by police after the pursuit ended.

properties.name: Name Withheld
properties.circumstances: Officer was driving on I-10 when he hit the victim, causing his airbags to deploy. The officer stopped and noticed a body next to his car. The victim was pronounced deceased at the scene.

properties.name: Dillion Pugsley
properties.circumstances: Officers were investigating a suspect (the victim) wanted for alleged Unlawful Possession of a Firearm and Illegal Discharge of a Weapon. Officers claim the victim fled in a vehicle. When the victim's vehicle was disabled, he allegedly fired at officers, who shot and killed the victim.

properties.name: Jacquline “Laney” Hudson
properties.circumstances: Cabell County Deputy involved in an accident which killed a minor. No other information available.

properties.name: William Shae McKay
properties.circumstances: The victim was pulled over by a sheriff's deputy and the victim allegedly shot the deputy and fled in his vehicle. Once the vehicle became disabled, the victim allegedly fired at officers who returned fire killing the victim.

properties.name: Reynaldo Ricarde
properties.circumstances: Police responded to mental health call.  Upon arrival they found the victim allegedly holding a weapon over his head.  He then allegedly advanced towards the officers who, claiming that he did not respond to requests to stop, shot and killed him.

properties.name: Randy Ness
properties.circumstances: Officers received a call of a man crashing his car into vehicles and structures. When police arrived and attempted a traffic stop, they claim the victim refused to stop and fled in a vehicle. Eventually, the victim allegedly backed his truck onto a police car with officers inside and another officer shot and killed him.

properties.name: Quayshawn Samuel
properties.circumstances: Officers were conducting an investigation at a building.  Police claim the victim attempted to flee on foot and when the officer caught him a struggle allegedly ensued. It was during this alleged struggle that the officer shot and killed the victim.

properties.name: Damean Alexander Jones
properties.agency_responsible: Hamilton County Sheriff's Office,Chattanooga Police Department
properties.circumstances: Deputies were pursuing a vehicle allegedly identified as stolen when the driver allegedly shot at them. Pursuit ended and victim got out of car and allegedly exchanged shots with deputies, where he was shot and killed.

properties.name: Michael J. Hanna
properties.circumstances: Officers pulled over a vehicle for a traffic stop. Allegedly, a scuffle occurred  when one of the many officers on scene used his taser weapon on the victim. The victim was then handcuffed and died an indeterminate time later.

properties.name: Warren Merriman
properties.circumstances: Officers received a 911 call for a disturbance. When they arrived, they encountered the victim who they claim was armed with a knife and refused to drop it. The victim allegedly lunged toward officers which is when they shot and killed him.

properties.name: Terry L. Bowman
properties.circumstances: Police officer patrolling parking lot pulled up on a car and turned on lights. When officer got out of patrol car, the victim allegedly got out of the other car with a gun. The officer shot and killed him.

properties.name: Enrique Lopez
properties.circumstances: Officers received a 911 call because the victim was allegedly threatening another resident. When officers arrived, they claim that the victim pulled out a knife and lunged at the officers, allegedly stabbing two of them. At this point one of the officers fired multiple shots striking and killing the victim.

properties.name: Nicholas S. Lassiter
properties.agency_responsible: Virginia State Police,Amelia County Sheriff's Department
properties.circumstances: Sheriff's department received a 911 call for a welfare check. The victim had active warrants so VA state police arrived as backup. When the officers entered the residence and encountered the victim, he allegedly fired at officers, hitting the deputy. The deputy and one state patrolman both returned fire, striking and killing the victim.

properties.name: Monet Darrisaw
properties.circumstances: Officers attempted to stop a possible stolen vehicle, but the victim allegedly led police on a chase. Officers deployed stop sticks causing the victim to lose control of the vehicle and crash, causing her death.

properties.name: Name Withheld
properties.circumstances: While responding to a request for medical assistance, police encountered an allegedly armed man (unrelated to the request for medical assistance) who refused to comply with commands. An officer shot and killed him.

properties.name: Trevontay Jenkins
properties.circumstances: Officers were called for a domestic disturbance. When they arrived and encountered the victim, they claim he refused commands and then allegedly pointed a gun at officer, at which point multiple officers shot and killed him.

properties.name: Zachary D. Zoran
properties.circumstances: Police responded to a 911 call for an attempted robbery. When they encountered the victim, police claim he was holding a knife and refused commands to drop it. The victim allegedly moved towards officers with the knife and an officer shot and killed the victim.

properties.name: Jose Palacios Pascacio
properties.circumstances: Officers dispatched to reports of a man believing he was being threatened.  When they arrived, the victim allegedly drove his car towards officers.  A vehicle pursuit followed.  Victim allegedly caused a traffic collision and his car went off the road.  When officers approached the car, the victim was gone.  Later they were called to a residence where the victim had walked in.  The victim allegedly stabbed a police k-9 and was then shot and killed by officers.

properties.name: Kyle Lobo
properties.circumstances: Officers were called for an assault. When they arrived, the victim who had been holding a child outside allegedly put the child down and pulled out a gun which is when officers shot and killed him.

properties.name: Name Withheld
properties.circumstances: A vehicle collision between an officer and another driver cause the death of the victim. No other details at this time.

properties.name: Michael Lee Delaney, Jr.
properties.agency_responsible: Weatherford Police Department,Texas Department of Public Safety
properties.circumstances: Officers were dispatched for a report of a stolen vehicle. Police claim they attempted to stop the vehicle but the victim instigated a chase. The victim crashed his vehicle and then attempted to flee on foot while allegedly firing at officers. Police fired multiple times, striking and killing victim.

properties.name: Name Withheld
properties.circumstances: Officers responded to a commercial burglary. The victim was shot and killed while police were investigating the crime. No further information available.

properties.name: Patrick Alexander
properties.circumstances: Officers reported recognizing the victim, who had several warrants, walking along the road with a gun. During the encounter, they claim the victim ignored commands to drop the weapon. The victim allegedly began to manipulate the gun and the officers shot and killed him.

properties.name: Rigo Mendez
properties.circumstances: Officers responded to a welfare check after neighbors heard shots fired inside the home. Upon arrival of deputies, the homeowner allegedly pointed a weapon at authorities and was then shot and killed.

properties.name: Robert Allen Vancleave
properties.circumstances: Officers were called for a report of a theft. Police claim they attempted a traffic stop on the victim but he fled and allegedly tried to hit an officer with his vehicle. Once the victim came to a stop and exited his car, the officers shot and killed him.

properties.name: Willie Pendleton
properties.agency_responsible: Gardena Police Department,L.A. County Sheriff’s Department
properties.circumstances: Officers were initially seeking person wanted for previous crime. Victim allegedly barricaded himself in his apartment for 33 hours. Deputies ultimately entered the apartment with a K9; on encountering the victim, victim is alleged to have shot at deputies and K9; deputies fired back, killing the victim.

properties.name: Deshawn L. Jones
properties.circumstances: Police received a 911 call for a domestic stabbing incident. Officers entered the residence and claim the victim was holding a knife and refused commands to drop it. The victim allegedly began moving towards officers which is when police shot and killed the victim.

properties.name: Corlunda McGinister
properties.circumstances: Police were called to a Walmart for a report of a woman with a gun and a hostage. Police encountered the victim and claim she refused to drop her weapon or release the employee she was allegedly holding. An officer shot and killed the victim.

properties.name: Fernando Fierro
properties.agency_responsible: California Highway Patrol ,Los Angeles County Sheriff's Department
properties.circumstances: Police claim they observed the victim driving at a high rate of speed and led police on a chase. When the victim arrived at the location, he barricaded himself and infant child inside for hours. The victim was allegedly pointing a gun at the infants head, and police shot and killed him.

properties.name: Todd Jordan
properties.circumstances: Police responded to calls of an active shooter inside a public business.  Officers entered the store and confront victim. Officers allege the victim did not follow verbal commands and then pulled out a handgun and began pointing it toward officers. Officers shot and killed him.

properties.name: Name Withheld
properties.circumstances: Marshals entered victim's home with intent of arresting victim. Victim was allegedly found hiding. On contact, victim reportedly refused to obey orders given by marshals, and is alleged to have brandished a firearm. Marshals shot victim, killing him.

properties.name: Name Withheld
properties.circumstances: Officers responded to a call about a man with a gun. Arriving officers locate the victim, allegedly armed with a gun, and fire their guns at him. The victim allegedly ran from police and got rid of the gun. Assembled police then relocated the victim and shot and killed him.

properties.name: Ryan Eric Schlosser
properties.circumstances: Officers respond to a call reporting a man erratically blocking the driveway of a neighbor. When officers arrived the victim allegedly attacked them with a knife and they shot him.

properties.name: Travis Wayne Hellinger
properties.agency_responsible: Marion County Sheriff's Department,Marion Police Department
properties.circumstances: Police were executing a search warrant at the location and claim the victim attempted to flee on foot while armed. Police also claim that the victim refused to drop his weapons so they released a k-9 dog at which point the victim allegedly fired at officers. Police returned fire, striking and killing the victim.

properties.name: Stanley Stubblefield
properties.circumstances: Officers were called to a report of shots fired at the facility. Officers arrived and encountered the victim in the basement and claim he was armed and holding two people hostage. Police ordered the victim to drop the weapon, but the victim allegedly pointed the gun at officers and one of the officers shot and killed the victim.

properties.name: Brandon Varao
properties.circumstances: Officers responded to report of a stabbing. Officers allege that the victim first had his arms raised after they arrived, then was brandishing a knife and moving quickly toward an officer. Officers then shot the victim, killing him.

properties.name: Michael Christopher Cline
properties.circumstances: Deputies went to arrest the victim for on a felony warrant. They allege a scuffle occurred upon trying to take him into custody and police deployed their taser weapon. Officers allege the victim then produced a knife and ran towards them. Deputies then shot and killed him.

properties.name: Name Withheld
properties.agency_responsible: West Virginia State Police,Berkeley County Sheriff's Office
properties.circumstances: Officers responded to report of domestic dispute involving gun. On arrival police shot and killed the victim.

properties.name: Matthew C. Lopez
properties.agency_responsible: Kenosha Police Department,Kenosha County Sheriff's Office,Wisconsin State Patrol,Pleasant Prairie Police Department
properties.circumstances: Officers responded to a report of an active shooter. When police arrived on the scene, the victim allegedly fired at officers, who returned fire killing the victim.

properties.name: Ali Naji
properties.circumstances: Police allege that the victim walked into a police station, pulled out a gun and pointed it and pulled the trigger at an officer behind the desk. The gun malfunctioned and did not fire. The officer shot and killed him.

properties.name: Bradley Munroe
properties.circumstances: An officer responded to calls of a possible assault in a parking lot. When police arrived, the victim was allegedly holding a knife and began striking a car window. Police allege that he then began walking toward the officer, still holding the knife, and refusing verbal commands. Police then shot and killed him.

properties.name: Alan Perez
properties.circumstances: Officers were called for a domestic dispute. Police claim the victim was armed with a knife which he refused to drop and when the victim allegedly moved towards officers, they shot and killed him.

properties.name: Victor Melendez
properties.circumstances: Officers responded to a call of domestic violence.  Police claim the victim fled in a car instigating a chase during which the victim crashed his car. The victim then allegedly refused commands from officers resulting in them shooting and killing the victim.

properties.name: Chatuma M. Crawford
properties.circumstances: Off-duty officer was driving and hit and killed a man he did not see stepping into the road to pick up his cell phone. NY AG ruled this an accident due to the victim being in the road.

properties.name: Name Withheld
properties.circumstances: Police responded to a call of a man having a mental episode, threatening suicide and possibly armed. After arrival, the victim called 911 and made threatening statements. Officers entered the home and allege the victim was trying to reach a hiding family member, when they shot and killed him.

properties.name: Joseph R. Coons
properties.circumstances: Officers responded to a call of a man who was armed, suicidal and threatening violence toward family members. Officers arrived and reported the victim was armed and an officer-involved shooting occurred.

properties.name: Name Withheld
properties.circumstances: Officers responded to a call for an unwanted person with a firearm.  When they arrived they observed the described suspect, when they allege that he made verbal threats before shooting toward police. Police then shot and killed him.

properties.name: Nelson Graham
properties.circumstances: Officers went to the location for a mental health/welfare check. Police claim the victim became combative and was resisting so they deployed a taser. The victim allegedly refused to be handcuffed, so the officers deployed their taser again. Victim became unresponsive and passed away in the hospital 6 days later.

properties.name: Mauricio Cisneros
properties.circumstances: Officers responded to wellness check after a 911 call hang-up from the victim's phone. Deputies engaged the victim upon arrival, where the victim asked for an ambulance. Officer alleged that the victim had a knife and refused to set it down. Officers acknowledged that the victim was experiencing a mental "episode" before deploying their taser. After being tased, the victim is alleged to be moving erratically but moved toward an officer with the knife when an officer shot and killed the victim.

properties.name: Jaylin Keshawn McKenzie
properties.circumstances: Officers attempted to make a traffic stop on a "suspicious" vehicle when a short pursuit began. After the pursuit, the victim allegedly exited the vehicle and exchanged gunfire with the officers. The victim was shot and killed during the exchange.

properties.name: Name Withheld
properties.agency_responsible: Uintah County Sheriff Department,Bureau of Indian Affairs
properties.circumstances: Deputies respond to a fight at a local motel.  When they arrived at the indicated room the victim allegedly fired at officers who shot and killed him.

properties.name: Brent A. Alsleben
properties.agency_responsible: Sibley County Sheriff's Department,Hutchinson Police Department,McLeod County Sheriff's Office
properties.circumstances: Deputies arrived to perform a welfare check. They claim the victim had a knife and barricaded himself inside the apartment. When they encountered the victim, they claim he refused to drop the knife and allegedly swung it towards the deputies. After deploying a taser, they claim he still would not drop the knife and when the victim stood up holding the knife, multiple deputies shot him, killing the victim.

properties.name: Jacob Cole Barnes
properties.circumstances: Police attempted to pull over victim's vehicle which led to a chase. Police claim victim got out of his vehicle and attempted to flee on foot, while firing at officers. After a foot chase, the victim allegedly barricaded himself in a house and exchanged gunfire with SWAT team during which the victim was shot and killed.

properties.name: William Foxx Blakely
properties.circumstances: Officers were called for an armed disturbance. Once they arrived they claim the victim refused commands to drop his weapon, so officers deployed a taser. When the taser was unsuccessful, the victim allegedly pointed a gun at the officers who then shot and killed the victim.

properties.name: Brent Lee Kopacka
properties.circumstances: Officers were called regarding a man threatening to kill his roommates. Once they arrived officers claim the victim barricaded himself inside his room and allegedly shot at police through the window. Police returned fire and the victim was killed.

properties.name: Katie Powers
properties.circumstances: Officers went to the home, with the landlord, for a welfare check. They claim to have encountered the victim in the basement, where she allegedly shot at the officers, hitting one in his chest. The officers returned fire, killing the victim.

properties.name: Name Withheld
properties.circumstances: Police were called regarding a man with a gun in building lobby. When officers knocked on the door where the victim was, they claim he answered the door holding a gun and officers shot him. The victim then allegedly barricaded himself inside the apartment and officer later entered the apartment to find the victim deceased.

properties.name: Amy Brogdon Anderson
properties.circumstances: Victim asked hotel to call 911 because she claimed she was being followed. After speaking with victim for approx. 30 minutes, police became concerned for well being of victim's minor daughter and called child protective services. Victim was attempting to leave with daughter when she allegedly opened fire from her car at officers. One officer returned fire, killing victim, while both officers were also killed during the incident.

properties.name: Bradly Locklin
properties.circumstances: Deputies called to shots fired inside a home. An hour after their arrival, the victim is alleged to have exited the house and fired a single shot; one deputy then shot the victim as the victim was walking back into the home, killing him.

properties.name: Name Withheld
properties.circumstances: Officer struck victim while she was crossing road on foot, killing her.

properties.name: Sean Michael Hinton
properties.circumstances: Deputies were called to the home by victim who police claim was agitated. When police arrived they removed the victim's wife and children from the home and attempted to speak with him. When they entered the home, the victim was allegedly armed and wearing body armor which resulted in the deputy shooting and killing him.

properties.name: Joshua Leon Wright
properties.agency_responsible: "Hays County Sheriff's Office, Texas Department of Public Safety"
properties.circumstances:
The victim was being treated at the hospital when he allegedly attempted to flee on foot and assaulted an officer. The officer then shot the victim multiple times, killing him.

Family continues to demand the release of video but the dept has not abided.

properties.name: Isaiah Winkley
properties.circumstances: Police responded to calls about a burglary in progress. Upon arrival they confronted the victim, who they allege was a suspect, and then they shot and killed him.

properties.name: Justin Ruddell
properties.circumstances: Police initiated a traffic stop for speeding. The victim allegedly initially fled and then reversed his vehicle towards officers. Officers shot at the vehicle. The victim then allegedly made his way to the back of his vehicle holding a flashlight and a battery pack taped together to look like a gun, which he allegedly pointed at the officer. Police shot and killed the victim.

properties.name: Name Withheld
properties.agency_responsible: Saratoga Springs Police,Bluffdale City Police Department,Utah County Sheriff's Office
properties.circumstances: Police were called for an alleged assault via strangulation. While police were at the location, the suspect accused of the assault came back with a weapon and alleged refused all police commands. Police shot and killed him.

properties.name: Peter Birmingham
properties.circumstances: Officers responded to a domestic disturbance call and encountered the victim allegedly armed and making threatening statements. As police attempted to negotiate with victim, they claim he fired at an overhead police aircraft which is when an officer shot and killed him.

properties.name: Latoris A. Taylor
properties.circumstances: Officers were investigating a carjacking when they came upon the vehicle. The victim allegedly fired at police who returned fire, striking and killing the victim.

properties.name: Michael Fredric Stevens
properties.circumstances: Deputies went to residence for an arrest warrant. They claim that the victim barricaded himself in a bedroom when they arrived. After speaking with negotiators, the victim allegedly came out of the room and pointed a gun at deputies, they responded by shooting and killing the victim.

properties.name: John Ray Romero
properties.circumstances: Officers responded to reports of a man pointing a gun at his head. Officers claim the victim fled on foot when they approached and when they encountered him he refused to drop his weapon. Officers deployed bean bag rounds and claim that as victim was getting up he allegedly pointed his gun at them. At this point, the officers fired their weapons, killing the victim.

properties.name: Randy Goens
properties.circumstances: Deputies arrived to serve a court-ordered eviction. On arrival, they knocked on the door of the residence, and the victim is alleged to have opened the door and pointed a gun at them. Officers claim that they told him to drop the gun, and then shot him, killing him.

properties.name: Derek Michael Large
properties.circumstances: Officers called to a domestic violence incident. Victim fled and was later tracked by K-9 unit. Police claim victim refused commands to drop weapon and allegedly pointed a gun at officers at which point the officers shot and killed the victim.

properties.name: Name Withheld
properties.circumstances: Officers responded to report of shots fired at a hotel.  The victim was barricaded in a room and allegedly fired shots inside the room. After hours of negotiation, the victim came out of the room, holding a gun and police claim he refused to drop it so they shot and killed the victim.

properties.name: Pierre Thompson
properties.circumstances: Officers responding to reports of armed robbery by two men  encountered victim fleeing address. Officers allege that victim shot at officers as they exited their vehicle. Officers returned fire, killing the victim.

properties.name: Jose Reza-Navarro
properties.circumstances: An officer initiated a traffic stop and, after engaging the driver, allege the driver sped away. Police pursued the vehicle and observed the driver allegedly hitting multiple vehicles. Officers stopped their pursuit, but later located the driver near the site of a separate collision. The victim was allegedly approaching officers, refusing commands to stop, when police shot and killed him.

properties.name: Justin A. Morgan
properties.circumstances: Officers called to shots fired at a residence. Upon arrival officers allege that they were confronted by the victim, who was armed.  Officers shot and killed him.

properties.name: Kevin James Wallace
properties.circumstances: Police responded to calls of a domestic disturbance. On arrival, they found the victim outside the apartment, allegedly holding a knife. Police report that the victim refused to drop the knife despite repeated commands and beanbag rounds. Allegedly, the man tried to get back into the apartment, upon which the police shot him.

properties.name: Steven Anthony Bentley
properties.agency_responsible: Blount County Sheriff's Office,Hayden Police Department
properties.circumstances: Officers responding to welfare check found victim and aunt at location. When both victim and aunt left the house, victim is alleged to have pointed a gun at officers, telling them to kill him. After the victim allegedly refused to put the gun down, the officers shot him repeatedly.

properties.name: Troy Bullock
properties.circumstances: Victim got into an altercation at a metro stop. Victim allegedly pushed off-duty FBI agent over a railing with both men falling to train platform. The agent shot and killed victim.

properties.name: Jeremy Fowler
properties.circumstances: Deputies received a call for service at the location. When they arrived, deputies claim victim approached them with a gun and refused orders to put it down. Victim allegedly pointed gun at deputies who then shot and killed him.

properties.name: Mark Davenport
properties.agency_responsible: St. Louis County Police Department ,Maryland Heights Police Department
properties.circumstances: Police were searching for victim due to existing warrants. They spotted him and claim he resisted arrest. Victim allegedly had an "edged weapon" and came towards officers when one of them shot and killed the victim.

properties.name: Dennis Happawana
properties.circumstances: Deputy responding to call alleges that victim shot at him on arrival at scene. Deputy pursued victim, who is reported to have fled into his house. Deputies claim to have smelled gas and heard a gas tank exploding a short time later, whereupon the rest of the victim's home was evacuated. At some point after that, a SWAT team responding to the scene shot the victim.

properties.name: Sherrano Stingley
properties.circumstances: Deputies respond to 911 call for a man under a car, fearing theft of a catalytic converter.  When deputies arrived they located the victim and subdued him after a struggle.  He became unresponsive.  He died 10 days later.

properties.name: Juan Carlos Rodriguez
properties.circumstances: Victim was on the side of the road working on a vehicle when the detective hit the victim and another person while driving in an unmarked vehicle.

properties.name: Lionel Rodriguez
properties.circumstances: Victim was on the side of the road working on a vehicle when the detective hit the victim while driving to work in an unmarked vehicle at an unknown speed.

properties.name: Alberto Quintero Gomez
properties.circumstances: Person called deputies saying that the victim was allegedly threatening him with a gun. When deputies arrived, they claim the victim resisted arrest during which they deployed a taser. The victim then allegedly grabbed a blunt object and used it to strike an officer, which is when officers fired, killing the victim.

properties.name: Howard Peter Johnson
properties.circumstances: Police were called for a domestic assault. When arriving, officers claim the victim was trying to flee and was possibly trying to carjack someone. One of the officers hit the victim with his car, the victim then allegedly fired his weapon at officers, who returned fire, striking and killing the victim.

properties.name: Tavares Harrington
properties.circumstances: Police received a call regarding a disturbance. When they arrived, they victim allegedly pointed a gun at officers, who then shot and killed the victim.

properties.name: James West Jr.
properties.circumstances: Police were called for a report of a suspicious vehicle. When they officer arrived and approached the vehicle, the victim allegedly fired at the officer who also fired his weapon. Both the officer and victim were hit and the victim was found a short time later in a vehicle and pronounced deceased.

properties.name: Daniel Rivera
properties.circumstances: Officers responding to report of car break-in encounter and pursue vehicle believed to be stolen. Victim allegedly "bailed out" of vehicle and began firing at police, who returned fire. Victim allegedly fled and was apprehended by police again, purportedly leading to another exchange in which victim was shot to death.

properties.name: Mark Limon
properties.circumstances: An officer initiated a traffic stop for alleged traffic violations and suspected criminal activity. As the trooper approached the vehicle, a passenger exited and confronted the trooper. The victim, who was the driver, allegedly attempted to drive away and the trooper fired his weapon striking and killing the him.

properties.name: Steven Louis Garcia
properties.circumstances: Police responded to a call of a stabbing. On scene the victim was identified as the suspect and allegedly refused to exit his residence. Officers allege that they heard a gunshot from inside before the victim began shooting from the doorway toward police. Officers shot and killed him.

properties.name: Austin Walsh
properties.circumstances: Victim was playing a video game with his roommate, an off-duty sheriff. Between rounds of the game, victim's roommate "jokingly" pointed a handgun at him and pulled the trigger, thinking the gun was unloaded. The gun discharged, killing the victim.

properties.name: Jerome Flanigan
properties.circumstances: Deputies arrived to serve a warrant. Deputies deployed a taser on victim and claim he tried to flee on foot. During the foot chase, the victim allegedly fired at deputies, who fired, striking and killing the victim.

properties.name: Tiyzair Ahmad Huddleston
properties.circumstances: Security guard called in report of suspicious person after victim allegedly approached her holding a knife and asking questions. Officers, responding to the call, allege that the victim refused to comply with requests to drop the knife, instead running towards one officer. Both officers fired their weapons, killing the victim.

properties.name: Jonathan Wesley Wiseman
properties.agency_responsible: Delaware State Police,Newport Police Department,New Castle County Police Department,New Castle Police Department
properties.circumstances: State police received a report for a "suspicious person with a gun". When police encountered victim he allegedly fled on foot and shots were exchanged. Victim then allegedly tried to carjack two people, was successful on the second and led police on a chase. Police blocked the highway to stop the vehicle and engaged in a shootout with the victim, killing him.

properties.name: Ronald Wayne Green
properties.agency_responsible: Rowan County Sheriff's Office,Granite Quarry Police Department
properties.circumstances: Firefighters went to the back of a burning mobile home to attempt a rescue and combat the fire, when victim allegedly began shooting. As officers arrived, more shots were reportedly fired by victim, leading to an exchange in which the victim was killed.

properties.name: Donald W. Hodges
properties.circumstances: Police responded to calls about a suspect shooting at passing vehicles. Upon arrival the deputy engaged and allegedly exchanged gunfire with the victim, killing him.

properties.name: Benjamin Joseph Remley
properties.agency_responsible: Volusia County Sheriff's Office,Daytona Beach Police Department
properties.circumstances: DBPD officer responding to call for trespass and VCSO sergeant incidentally onsite attempted to detain victim for trespassing. Victim is alleged to have resisted arrest and to have attacked one officer with a knife at some point during the encounter. DBPD officer shot the victim twice, killing him.

properties.name: James Ready
properties.circumstances: Officers responding to reports of stabbing claim that they encountered victim holding a knife. The victim allegedly ignored several requests to drop the knife and began to move towards the police, whereupon the officer shot and killed him.

properties.name: Dylan D. Walstrom
properties.circumstances: Officer investigating parked car alleges that victim, sitting in car, did not comply with commands given on encounter. Reportedly, the victim opened the car door and, when the officer met him, was armed. This led to an altercation in which the officer shot the victim multiple times, killing him.

properties.name: Name Withheld
properties.agency_responsible: Tulare Police Department,Tulare County Sheriff's Department
properties.circumstances: Officers observed a vehicle that had been reported stolen earlier that night. Deputies allege they tried to make contact with the vehicle's two occupants but that they were uncooperative. An officer used a taser on the victim, who they allege then took out a gun and pointed it toward officers before they shot and killed him.

properties.name: Deshawn Whitaker
properties.circumstances: An officer responded to an automated license plate reader that flagged a vehicle that had been reported. Police located and conducted a traffic stop on the vehicle. While attempting to detain the victim, police allege that he fled on foot. They then attempted to detain with the passenger, who they allege was armed and resisted arrest. During the struggle with the passenger, police allege the victim returned, armed themselves and pointed a gun toward officers who then shot and killed him.

properties.name: Watts Williams
properties.circumstances: Police responded to a call for a welfare check of a man in a vehicle. When police arrived, they attempted to wake up the victim. Police allege the victim started the vehicle and reversed the car into the police cars. Police then shot and killed the victim.

properties.name: Delfino Avila
properties.circumstances: Police received a call regarding an arson at an abandoned property. When they arrived they encountered victim allegedly holding a “wooden bludgeon".  Police allege the victim began swinging the wood piece at officers. Police then shot and killed the victim.

properties.name: Joshua Antelope
properties.circumstances: Police responded to a call alleging a man armed with a knife was attempting to break into a school. Police allege the victim did not comply with commands to drop the knife. Police allege he came toward them with the knife, at which point police shot and killed the victim.

properties.name: David Orlando Andrade Gomez
properties.circumstances: Federal and local police gathered at a residence to execute an arrest warrant on the victim. Police have not stated whether or not the victim allegedly shot at police. However, police shot and killed the victim.

properties.name: Enrique Alcarez
properties.circumstances: Officers attempted a traffic stop of a vehicle allegedly involved in a previous incident. Police allege the victim fled and crashed the vehicle into a fence. Police allege the victim alleged showed a gun, at which time police shot and killed the victim.

properties.name: Aaron Mensah
properties.circumstances: Deputies responded to a call of an alleged stabbing. On arrival, they encountered the victim allegedly armed with a knife. After the officers gave verbal orders to drop the knife and fired a beanbag round, the victim allegedly moved towards one officer, who fired his Taser at the victim.  Three officers then shot and killed the victim.

properties.name: Francis Englebright
properties.circumstances: Cherokee Nation Marshals claim the victim showed a pistol to officers serving the warrant then barricaded himself inside his home. Some time later, the victim allegedly came out to confront the officers, whereupon the SWAT team shot and killed him.

properties.name: Reymundo Ricardo Flores
properties.circumstances: Officers  were tipped off to location of the victim who allegedly had an active fugitive warrant. Police allege the victim fled on foot and began shooting at deputies. Police then shot and killed the victim.

properties.name: Ricardo Almons Gary
properties.circumstances: Officers called for an erratic man.  When they located the victim, he allegedly became combative and officers deployed a taser. Victim became unresponsive and was transported to a hospital where he died.

properties.name: Robert Duncan Jr.
properties.circumstances: Officers were sent to area on reports of an armed robbery. On arrival, the deputy reportedly identified the victim as the suspect and deployed a K9 unit to arrest the victim, who is then alleged to have fired a gun. The deputy then shot and killed the victim.

properties.name: Gus Spanoudis
properties.circumstances: Officers forced entry into the victim's apartment on suspicion of involvement in a hit-and-run. On contact, the victim was alleged to have made suicidal statements, then to have pointed a gun at one of the officers. Said officer is reported to have told the victim to drop the weapon, then to have shot the victim.

properties.name: Calvin L. Brown Jr
properties.circumstances: An off-duty officer was working as private security guard when the victim allegedly approached him. The victim then allegedly pulled out a weapon from his pocket. They struggled and the officer then shot and killed the victim.

properties.name: Name Withheld
properties.circumstances: Police responded to a call of an alleged suicidal man. Police allege the officers attempted to help the victim and told him to drop the gun. Police allege he refused and then officers then shot and killed the victim.

properties.name: Jose Soliz
properties.circumstances: Police received a call regarding a man with a gun. When they arrived, police claim that the victim ignored commands to drop his weapon. He then allegedly pointed the gun at officers, at which point they fired their weapons killing the victim.

properties.name: Jorge Martinez-Sanchez
properties.circumstances: Officers called to a domestic violence situation.  The victim was allegedly barricaded in the residence with a child and police claim the victim had an "edged weapon". Negotiations were unsuccessful and SWAT entered and killed the victim.

properties.name: Mark Winek
properties.circumstances: An active officer traveled to a home in another state to meet an underaged person he had groomed online. Upon arrival at the home he killed the victim and two other relatives of the underaged target before abducting her in his car.

properties.name: Brooke Winek
properties.circumstances: An active officer traveled to a home in another state to meet an underaged person he had groomed online. Upon arrival at the home he killed the victim and two other relatives of the underaged target before abducting her in his car.

properties.name: Shari Winek
properties.circumstances: An active officer traveled to a home in another state to meet an underaged person he had groomed online. Upon arrival at the home he killed the victim and two other relatives of the underaged target before abducting her in his car.

properties.name: Blaine Denetdele
properties.circumstances: Victim's stepfather called police for a domestic disturbance. Victim came out of the house and allegedly charged at officers while holding two knives. Officers fired a non-lethal round immediately followed by shooting him with lethal rounds, killing victim.

properties.name: Jose Torres
properties.circumstances: Police received a report of a domestic disturbance. Once police arrived, they claim the victim brandished a weapon and the police shot and killed him.

properties.name: Angela Nuckols
properties.circumstances: Officers attempt to stop a potential stolen vehicle.  The victim allegedly crashed into another vehicle and got out of the car with a firearm.  The officer shot her.

properties.name: Austin Wellott
properties.circumstances: Initial police response to domestic disturbance call. After making contact, the victim is alleged to have tried to run from the cops. One of the officers chasing the victim shot him.

properties.name: Shane Michael Boston
properties.agency_responsible: Illinois State Police,Litchfield Police Department,Montgomery County Sheriff's Office
properties.circumstances: Officers were responding to a call about a suspicious person at an area business. Police arrived at the location when they they encountered the victim, who they allege was carrying a gun. The victim allegedly fled on foot and upon stopping allegedly lifted a gun toward officers who shot and killed him.

properties.name: Sunshine Marie Foy
properties.circumstances: Police initiated a traffic stop on the victim. Victim is alleged to have fled into her home and attempted to shoot officers; however, her gun reportedly jammed. Officers shot the victim, killing her.

properties.name: Name Withheld
properties.circumstances: Deputies responding to a reported break-in. When they arrived they noticed the victim walking away. They engaged the victim at a second location and allege that the victim shot at officers who then shot and killed him.

properties.name: Jesse Hall
properties.circumstances: Officers responded to a wellness check for a suicidal victim who then allegedly barricaded himself in a room. Once officers entered the room, they allege the victim pointed a gun at them. Police then shot and killed him.

properties.name: Cody Allan Smestad
properties.circumstances: Police responded to an alleged break-in. When police arrived, they allege the victim emerged and then fled back into the home. Police allege he emerged again with a rifle and turned toward police. Police then shot and killed the victim.

properties.name: Tyree Devon O’Neal Jr.
properties.circumstances: Officers were conducting surveillance on the victim for his alleged involvement in a previous incident. Police allege when officers attempted to take him into custody he fled on foot and allegedly displayed a rifle.  He then came back and got into a car and allegedly drove towards officers.  Officers then shot and killed him.

properties.name: Travis W. Fields
properties.circumstances: Deputies were pursuing victim's vehicle. After crashing, the victim is alleged to have disappeared into the surrounding area. While searching, deputies allege the victim shot at deputies. Police then shot and killed the victim.

properties.name: Justin Anderson
properties.circumstances: Deputies attempted a traffic stop, but victim allegedly refused to pull over. Police eventually used a PIT maneuver to disable car and when observing the victim to allegedly have a gun, multiple officers fired their weapons, killing victim.

properties.name: Lerelle Dekari Chatman
properties.circumstances: Police received a 911 call regarding a homicide. When in the area they saw the victim with a gun and as they approached, victim allegedly fired at police, who returned fire killing victim.

properties.name: Daniel Kachinoski
properties.circumstances: Police were called for a domestic incident. Officers attempted to arrest the victim. The victim allegedly resisted arrest and lunged at officers with a knife, which is when they shot and killed him.

properties.name: Eric Holmes
properties.circumstances: An officer was investigating a vehicle allegedly reported as stolen. The victim approached the officers and after a brief conversation allegedly got into the stolen car and drove away.  Officers shot at the car and pursued the vehicle.  The vehicle veered off the road and officers found the victim shot.  He was transported to a hospital where he later died.

properties.name: Ross Milton Floersheim
properties.circumstances: Officers called for a domestic disturbance.  When they arrived the victim allegedly came out of the home and shot at officers who shot him.  He was transported to a local hospital and died 5 days later.

properties.name: Billy Wayne Denton
properties.circumstances: Deputies allege that victim fled from traffic stop. After or while fleeing deputies allege the victim shot at them. Police then shot and killed the victim.

properties.name: Ruben Ernesto Dorado
properties.agency_responsible: West Baton Rouge Parish Sheriff's Office
properties.circumstances: Deputies responding to assault call allege to have, on arrival, found victim "actively attacking" DOTD worker. Officers subsequently shot the victim.

properties.name: Martin John Bradley
properties.circumstances: Officers respond to call of domestic disturbance.  When officers arrived, the victim allegedly came out of the house and fired a shot at police who shot him.

properties.name: Alma Worthington
properties.agency_responsible: Herriman Police Department,Riverton Police Department,South Jordan Police Department
properties.circumstances: Victim allegedly called police saying he was suicidal. Police arrived and claim negotiations with victim broke down resulting in victim walking out and allegedly firing a gun at neighboring houses and police. Police returned fire, killing victim.

properties.name: Taylor Lee Shomaker
properties.agency_responsible: O'Fallon Police Department,St. Peter's Police Department,St. Charles City Police Department
properties.circumstances: 911 had been called about a man having a mental health crisis. Responding police learned that the victim had threatened his parents with a gun and that the gun had gone off while his father tried to take a gun from them. The victim's parents left the residence. Police allege the armed victim would not come out of the house. After an extended standoff police allege the victim left the house and fired at police who then shot and killed him.

properties.name: Name Withheld
properties.circumstances: Officers dispatched to reported disturbance. On arrival, police allege to have seen the victim holding a gun.  An officer shot him.

properties.name: Miguel Romero
properties.circumstances: Victim was allegedly walking when he was struck by an officer in an unmarked vehicle. No prior contact or preceding circumstances are indicated.

properties.name: Immanueal Jaquez Clark-Johnson
properties.circumstances: Officers suspected that the victim may have been involved in an armed robbery that occurred earlier that night. Officers followed victim by car until victim stopped in a parking lot. At least one of the officers shot the victim some time after "attempting to make contact."

properties.name: Name Withheld
properties.agency_responsible: New York Police Department,New York State Police,Drug Enforcement Administration
properties.circumstances: Officers were on site to carry out a narcotics operation and attempted to arrest the victim and one other person. As they attempted to apprehend them shots were allegedly exchanged and the victim was shot and killed.

properties.name: Neil Alexander Costin
properties.circumstances: Victim allegedly carjacked a semi trucks and was driving erratically before crashing in the median. Police responded and victim barricaded himself inside the vehicle before leaving and allegedly running towards officers with a boxcutter, which is when police shot and killed him.

properties.name: James Mathew Murphy
properties.circumstances: Police were responding to a call about a disturbance by someone having a mental health crisis. Officers allege that upon locating the victim they could see they were holding a knife. The officer calling to the victim, and they allege the victim immediately ran at and scuffled physically. During the engagement the officer shot and killed the victim.

properties.name: Tristan Charles Melton
properties.circumstances: Police identified a car known to be associated with a person wanted on a warrant. They initiated a traffic stop and the driver allegedly refused to stop and led officers on a pursuit. Police conducted a PIT maneuver which resulted in the car leaving the road and crashing. Officers allege the victim then left the car while shooting at officers before they shot and killed him.

properties.name: Roberto Armijo
properties.circumstances: Victim was pulled over during a traffic stop. He then barricaded himself in the vehicle for hours. Police claim victim attempted to move the vehicle but they had flattened the tires, police then fired chemical agents into the car. At this point, victim got out of the vehicle allegedly holding a machete and shield and was immediately shot and killed by police.

properties.name: Nicholas Mitchell
properties.circumstances: Victim knocks on door of Sheriff's Department. Deputy speaks with victim until victim allegedly pulls out a gun and shoots deputy, who returns fire, killing the victim.

properties.name: Abran Gutierrez
properties.circumstances: Police responded to a 911 call.  On arrival, they allegedly discovered a domestic violence situation.  The victim had allegedly armed himself with a handgun and used a child as a "shield".  Before establishing negotiations, officers suspected the victim was going to shoot another person in the situation, and shot the victim.

properties.name: John R. Wells, Jr
properties.circumstances: US Marshals were attempting to locate the victim for a previous incident.  They allege the victim began shooting at Marshals. Marshals then shot and killed the victim.

properties.name: Name Withheld
properties.circumstances: Police approached three people in a vehicle. Police allege the victim refused commands and allegedly pointed a gun at which point they shot him.

properties.name: Thomas Phan
properties.circumstances: Police made contact with victim alleging that victim matched description of a robbery suspect. Police report that victim was armed in their first encounter and, after police failed to subdue victim with a taser, victim fled on foot. On encountering victim again, the victim allegedly was holding knives and moved as if to throw them, whereupon the police killed the victim.

properties.name: Joe Don Williams
properties.circumstances: Police received several 911 calls for a man with a gun. When officers arrived, victim was pacing in store and they allege he fired shots inside, before walking outside and continuing to fire at cars and officers. Police then shot and killed victim.

properties.name: Kevin Dizmang
properties.circumstances: A mental health response personnel (including a police officer) responded to attend to the victim. The officer "made contact and attempted to escort him out of the roadway," which led to an alleged struggle. The victim was handcuffed and died soon after.

properties.name: Jesse Mavrick Minton
properties.circumstances: Deputies called for a suspicious person with a gun. As deputies attempted to place victim under arrest he allegedly drew a weapon, and deputies shot and killed him.

properties.name: Rajan David Moonesinghe
properties.circumstances: Officers received a call about a man with a gun. The victim was on his porch with a possible intruder in the home when police arrived. Officers gave the order to drop the weapon as they fired at victim, killing him.

properties.name: Matthew R. Teears
properties.circumstances: Police responded to a call from a neighbor of the victim reporting having heard gunshots and noticed bullet holes. The victim was barricaded in his home when SWAT and crisis negotiators were called. The victim then exited the home following alleged arson. Further alleged that victim then began shooting at deputies and was killed in returned gunfire.

properties.name: Jerrionte Gibson
properties.circumstances: Officer and victim allegedly got into an argument in the street. Police claim the victim was armed and at some point the officer shot and killed the victim.

properties.name: Angely Solis
properties.circumstances: An off-duty police officer was reportedly involved in a domestic dispute and killed the victim and wounded another, before killing herself.

properties.name: Phymor Tenry
properties.agency_responsible: Centralia Police Department,Lewis County Sheriff's Office,Washington State Patrol,Chehalis Police Department
properties.circumstances: Police were called regarding a suspicious vehicle and determined it was stolen. Officers used spike strips to disable vehicle, victim and additional suspect then carjacked another vehicle. After victim allegedly exchanged gunfire with police, one suspect surrendered and police claim the victim confronted them in a threatening manner and they responded by shooting and killing him.

properties.name: Marcus Allen
properties.circumstances: Police responded to a call regarding the victim allegedly with a gun. Officers allege that while attempting to talk to with victim, he began shooting at officers. Police then shot and killed the victim.

properties.name: Adam Romero
properties.circumstances: Officers called to a home for reports of a man stabbing himself with a knife.  When officers arrived, they allegedly found the victim in the back yard stabbing himself.  Police allege the victim did not drop the knife and began walking toward them. Police then shot and killed the victim.

properties.name: Senquarius Demonta Williams
properties.circumstances: Officers claim that victim walked into a crime scene they were working and when confronted, victim allegedly pulled out a gun and fired at officers who then shot and killed victim.

properties.name: Drandon John Brown
properties.circumstances: Officers responding to calls regarding a man throwing things at vehicles on the road.  When they arrive, they allege the victim came at them with a knife and they deployed a taser and then immediately shot and killed him.

properties.name: Kenneth Scott Wallis
properties.circumstances: The deputy stopped the victim on a bike for a traffic violation. The deputy alleged the victim attempted to flee on his bike and then pulled out a cleaver. The deputy then shot and killed the victim.

properties.name: Gary Jean Schryver
properties.circumstances: Deputies were attempting to serve a warrant for the victim. Deputies allege the victim became confrontational toward police. The deputies then shot and killed the victim.

properties.name: Name Withheld
properties.circumstances: Officers responded to reports of the victim allegedly shooting another person. Police allege when they arrived, the victim continued to shoot inside the apartment and allegedly fired at police. After the exchange of gunfire, the victim was found dead in the aprtment.

properties.name: Payton A. Masterson
properties.circumstances: Officers attempted to conduct a traffic stop.  Police allege the victim did not stop and police pursued the victim. Police allege the victim began shooting at police during the pursuit. Police allege the victim then fled into his apartment.  The victim allegedly shot from the apartment and police returned fire, killing him.

properties.name: Name Withheld
properties.circumstances: An off-duty Border Patrol Agent claims that men were attempting to break into a vehicle.  When the agent confronted the men, one of them allegedly pulled a gun.  The agent shot him.  The suspects then fled in a vehicle and later dropped the injured victim off at a hospital where he died.

properties.name: Reginald Perry Bethea
properties.circumstances: Officers called to scene of man with a weapon.  Upon arrival they located the victim who allegedly produced a handgun and there was an officer-involved shooting.

properties.name: Ki'Azia Miller
properties.circumstances: Officers called to scene for woman with mental health crisis allegedly assaulting family members and being armed.  Officers entered the home and the woman allegedly went for a gun when a struggle ensued and she was shot.

properties.name: Jesus Crosby
properties.circumstances: Police responded to a report of the victim trespassing. Police allege the victim was armed with a knife, but was nail clippers. Police then shot and killed the victim.

properties.name: Jermaine Hickson
properties.circumstances: Following 911 calls and a shotspotter alert, officers arrived on the scene and heard gunshots. They found the victim allegedly firing shots at an intersection.  When he saw police, he allegedly began shooting at them. Police then shot and killed the victim.

properties.name: Prince Jones
properties.circumstances: Police were attempting to locate the victim for a previous incident. When police located the victim they allege he began pacing with a weapon. Police allege negotiating was ineffective and the victim would not drop his weapon. Police then shot and killed the victim.

properties.name: Hugo Corral-Velasco
properties.circumstances: Police were investigating a stolen vehicle when they encountered the victim unresponsive in a vehicle. Police allege the victim had a gun. When police allegedly tried to wake up the victim, the victim grabbed the gun and begun firing at police. Police then shot and killed the victim.

properties.name: William Fairweather
properties.agency_responsible: Rogers County Sheriff's Office,Cherokee Nation Marshal Service
properties.circumstances: Police responded to a call of a man allegedly barricaded inside a room. Police allege the victim was creating a disturbance and armed with a nail gun. Police allege they attempted to negotiate with the victim for several hours. Police allege he finally exited the room and began shooting the nail gun at police. Police then shot and killed the victim.

properties.name: Jorge Miguel Lopez
properties.circumstances: Officers attempted a traffic stop which resulted in a chase. The vehicle the victim was in crashed and an "armed encounter" occurred soon after resulting in the victim being shot and killed.

properties.name: Benjamin Jackman Weise
properties.circumstances: Police attempted to serve a warrant  for the victim. Police claim the victim then barricaded himself in the residence with a knife. After 3 hours, police allege the victim attempted to leave and approached officers with the knife. Police then shot and killed the victim.

properties.name: Kenneth Lee Collins
properties.circumstances: Officers were called for a domestic disturbance. When they arrived, they allege the victim had an axe. Police allege he moved toward them with the axe, at which time police shot and killed him.

properties.name: Derrick Kittling
properties.circumstances: The officer initially conducted a traffic stop on the victim. The officer alleged the victim was not compliant and got into a fight with the officer. Police allege the victim got a hold of the officer's Taser, at which point the officer shot and killed the victim.

properties.name: Tyree Moorehead
properties.circumstances: Officers were responding to a report of a person holding a weapon when they encountered the victim, allegedly holding a knife and assaulting someone on the ground. The police shot and killed him.

properties.name: Kenneth E. Vinyard
properties.circumstances: Victim was assisting a gunshot victim in the area.  An unidentified off-duty officer said "get back" to the victim.  The victim allegedly did not immediately back up and the officer knocked him to the ground where he hit his head.  He died at a hospital shortly after.

properties.name: Brian Taylor
properties.circumstances: Police responded to multiple calls of multiple people shot. Police allege when they located the victim, he was armed and began to shoot at police. Troopers then shot and killed the victim.

properties.name: Name Withheld
properties.circumstances: Police got reports of a man armed with a gun acting erratically in a business parking lot. Police allege that when the officer arrived and tried to talk to the victim, the victim pulled out a gun and began shooting at the officer. The officer then shot and killed the victim.

properties.name: Javon Tyrone Jones
properties.circumstances: Officers received 911 call for someone shot. When arriving they didn't find anyone but allege the victim shoot at a vehicle in the parking lot. The officers confronted the victim who allegedly refused to drop his weapon, at which point they shot and killed him.

properties.name: Julian Sanchez
properties.circumstances: Police responded to a crash. When police arrived, police allege the victim had a gun and fired a shot. It appears the victim shot himself in the leg. Police then shot and killed the victim.

properties.name: John Samuel File
properties.circumstances: Deputies responded to an alleged disturbance call. Shortly thereafter, additional deputies responded for a follow-up investigation related to the disturbance. As deputies arrived at the residence, the victim allegedly walked out of his residence armed with a knife and rushed the deputies and a deputy shot and killed him.

properties.name: Sergio Gomez
properties.circumstances: Officers responded to a call of a suspicious man with a gun. Officers encountered victim and claim he refused to take his hands out of his pockets, so they deployed a taser on him. At this point, victim allegedly pointed a gun (ended up being a replica) at officers and they shot and killed him.

properties.name: Marando Salmon
properties.circumstances: Officers were responding to a call regarding a stolen vehicle.  When they arrived, they entered the home and allege that when they opened a bedroom door the victim allegedly threw an object at officers.  Officers state the victim reached for something and they thought that was a gun so they shot him.

properties.name: Timothy Wayne Hodges
properties.circumstances: Deputies responded to request for assistance with a vehicular accident with a possibly intoxicated male attempting to flee on foot.  When deputies located the victim, he allegedly pulled out a gun and aimed it at his own head.  As officers attempted to negotiate, the victim allegedly aimed his gun at officers who shot him.

properties.name: Rodney Finch
properties.circumstances: Officers responded to a call regarding a man pointing a gun at people on the street. Police arrived and victim allegedly pointed a gun at officers at which point an officer fired his weapon killing victim.

properties.name: Jose Alexis Cabrera Hernandez
properties.circumstances: Victim was wanted by police for alleged murder and kidnapping.  Officers traced victim to a parking lot.  They rescued the hostage from the car and shot and killed the victim.

properties.name: Tye Andrew Sutherland
properties.circumstances: Police responded to a call about a man allegedly with a gun. When police arrived, another department began a pursuit on the victim. Police have not released details on what led to the shooting but the victim was shot and killed by police.

properties.name: Ramiro Lozano
properties.circumstances: Officers were called about a man with a knife at an area business. Upon arrival, police located the suspect allegedly carrying an axe and moving toward other staffed businesses. With few other details available, police shot and killed the victim.

properties.name: Kyle Styles Lovera Lockett
properties.circumstances: Victim was stabbed inside bodega. Victim chased the man that stabbed him and allegedly shot at him on the sidewalk. Police were crossing the street and witnessed this and shot the victim, killing him.

properties.name: Tyler Mathew Nastazio
properties.agency_responsible: Kern County Sheriff's Office,Tehachapi Police Department
properties.circumstances: Officers responded to report of domestic disturbance which was then updated to be an alleged stabbing.  When they arrived, the victim allegedly came out of the home with a knife and police shot him.

properties.name: Krysten Harland Pretlor
properties.circumstances: Police attempted to stop victim who had an arrest warrant. Victim allegedly led police on a chase while shooting at them. Police used a PIT maneuver to stop the vehicle and claim that victim pointed gun at police, at which point they shot and killed him.

properties.name: Leontae Kirk
properties.circumstances: Police received a 911 call regarding a person (victim) threatening an individual with a gun. When officers arrived and allegedly found multiple people holding guns, they fired upon victim, killing him.

properties.name: Matthew Orlando Dilworth
properties.circumstances: Officers attempted a traffic stop but claim the victim fled on foot. Victim allegedly had a gun and fired at officers when he tried to flee again, at which point officers fired at victim, killing him.

properties.name: Wyatt Beckler
properties.circumstances: Officers respond to call of domestic disturbance with armed suspect.  Officers claim that victim refused commands and allegedly had a weapon, when the officer shot and killed him.

properties.name: Eric Jermaine Allen
properties.circumstances: During a traffic stop, officer asked passenger (victim) to exit the vehicle. The victim allegedly moved to the driver seat and began to drive away with an officer in the vehicle. The officer claims an initial taser was infective, leading the officer to shoot victim, killing him.

properties.name: Eugene Elliot Reed
properties.circumstances: Police attempted to serve an arrest warrant.  Victim allegedly threatened to shoot officers. Victim barricaded himself in the home and after negotiations officers claim victim pointed a laser sight at them and they fired on the house. Victim allegedly fired back and was shot and killed during the exchange.

properties.name: Raymundo Duran III
properties.circumstances: Police attempted to arrest victim for an outstanding warrant and claim he rammed one of their patrol cars and was holding a gun. Victim allegedly raised his firearm which is when officers opened fire, killing the victim.

properties.name: James Albert Templeton Jr.
properties.circumstances: Police arrive at residence to arrest the victim on a warrant.  Allegedly, the victim had a weapon and exchanged shots with officers when the victim was shot and killed.

properties.name: Donathy Wayne Doddy
properties.circumstances: Officers were responding to call about an argument where one of those involved had a gun. Upon arrival, officers allegedly recognized victim and saw that he had a gun. Police allege that the victim allegedly charged and shot at officers. Officers returned fire killing the victim.

properties.name: Zachary John Cervice
properties.circumstances: Officers responded to an residence in response to calls of a domestic disturbance. While interviewing people, the victim allegedly arrived while carrying a gun, refused commands to drop it and pointing it at officers before they shot and killed him.

properties.name: Name Withheld
properties.circumstances: A police officer was responding to a call for service and struck and killed a pedestrian unrelated to the call with his vehicle. The victim was pronounced deceased from the accident.

properties.name: Name Withheld
properties.circumstances: Agents responded to surveillance footage of multiple people allegedly crossing the border, including one alleged to be armed. After encountering the group, agents shot and killed one member of the group.

properties.name: Salvador Maceda
properties.circumstances: Officers encountered victim during an investigation and claim he approached them holding knives. Victim then barricaded himself on the balcony of an occupied apartment and when he allegedly tried to break into the apartment, the officer shot and killed him.

properties.name: Name Withheld
properties.circumstances: Officers called with reports of a man with a gun. When officers encountered victim, they claim he pulled out two knives. Eventually the victim allegedly threw a knife at an officer, prompting several officers to fire their weapons, killing victim.

properties.name: Randall Bass
properties.circumstances: Officers were responding to a call about a woman being threatened by a known man outside her house. He was threatening harm as well as forcing police to take fatal action upon him. Arriving police allege the victim barricaded himself inside his vehicle. He allegedly told police he had an explosive device and then shot a firearm into the air. The victim then exited the vehicle with a pack and a rifle before police shot and killed him.

properties.name: Jeramyah Wilson
properties.circumstances: Officers responding to reports of gunshots arrived to find the victim sitting in a car allegedly holding a gun. Officers claim victim made verbal threats towards them and when he allegedly made a sudden movement inside the vehicle, officers fired their weapons, killing the victim.

properties.name: Kenneth Jamel Carrol
properties.agency_responsible: Davenport Police Department,Iowa State Patrol,Bettendorf Police Department
properties.circumstances: Officers attempted a traffic stop which turned into a chase. Officers encountered victim and claim he refused several commands to get on the ground, after allegedly firing at officers. At this point, the officers fired their weapons killing victim.

properties.name: Name Withheld
properties.agency_responsible: Guadalupe County Sheriff's Office,Texas Department of Public Safety
properties.circumstances: An officer identified a stolen vehicle and attempted to conduct a traffic stop. The victim, who was driving the truck, allegedly tried to flee in the vehicle, striking one of the patrol cars when the trooper shot and killed the victim.

properties.name: Name Withheld
properties.circumstances: Deputies attempted a traffic stop on a person on an ATV. The driver allegedly did not stop, until he then ran away from his vehicle and the pursuing officer. An undescribed altercation then occurred when the officer shot and killed the victim.

properties.name: Willie Williams
properties.circumstances: Officers heard gunshots and they locate the victim who was allegedly actively  firing a weapon. The victim allegedly refused verbal commands and kept shooting after officers arrived when they shot and killed him.

properties.name: Richard Quave Jr.
properties.circumstances: Police were responding to calls of shot fired.  When they arrived the victim was allegedly armed and pointed a gun at officers who shot and killed him.

properties.name: Ivan Hinojosa
properties.agency_responsible: Texas Department of Public Safety ,Alice Police Department,Jim Wells County Sheriff's Office
properties.circumstances: Officers were responding calls of a shooting and attempted a traffic stop on a vehicle matching the description of one involved. The driver allegedly then led police on an extended pursuit. Officers deployed spike strips to disable to vehicle. They allege the victim then fled on foot. Police allege the victim was carrying a weapon and shot and killed the victim when he raised it toward officers.

properties.name: Breen Reiss
properties.circumstances: Officers searching for domestic violence suspect who, the accuser indicated, would likely shoot at police. After locating the suspect, they allegedly exited car and began walking away.  When officers approached the victim he allegedly pulled out and fired a gun and multiple officers shot and killed him.

properties.name: Carlos Trotter
properties.circumstances: Police identified a stolen vehicle and attempted a traffic stop. The driver allegedly would not stop then led police on an extended pursuit. After the victim's vehicle crashed, police approached and allegedly the victim showed an unnamed weapon when officers shot and killed him.

properties.name: Joshua Bailes
properties.circumstances: Officers were searching for the victim on a warrant. Police tracked him to a residence and, upon attempting to make contact, the victim allegedly opened the door and pointed a gun at officers, who shot and killed him.

properties.name: Javier Manuel Soto
properties.circumstances: Police responded to a call of a vehicle stopped in the middle of a road. When the deputy arrive, they allege they found the victim and another person standing outside. Police allege the victim began firing at police, hitting the deputy. The deputy then shot and killed the victim.

properties.name: James Wilborn
properties.circumstances: Plainclothes officer allegedly witnessed a domestic disturbance where a person was damaging the victims vehicle. At one point the person was on top of the victims car when they pulled forward, causing that person to fall. The officer allegedly engaged the victim outside the car leading to a physical altercation. During the alleged altercation, the officer shot and killed victim.

properties.name: David Strain
properties.circumstances: Officers saw suspicious vehicle in parking lot.  When they approached the car and knocked on the window, shots were allegedly fired from inside the vehicle. Police returned fire killing two occupants.

properties.name: Clarissa Daws
properties.circumstances: Officers saw suspicious vehicle in parking lot.  When they approached the car and knocked on the window, shots were allegedly fired from inside the vehicle. Police returned fire killing two occupants.

properties.name: Alfredo Gonzalez-Garza
properties.circumstances: Police responding to a call about a man having struck a vehicle with a pole and disrupting traffic. Police arrived and confronted the man who then allegedly held a knife. When the victim walked away, he turned back toward the officer with the knife in his hand when the officer shot and killed him.

properties.name: Ezekiel Lamar Love
properties.circumstances: Deputies were called for someone allegedly damaging property. When they arrived the victim allegedly fired at the patrol car, at which time deputies shot and  killed the victim.

properties.name: Name Withheld
properties.circumstances: Police responded to a domestic disturbance call. When police arrived they allege the victim fled in a car. Police followed the victim in a pursuit and the victim eventually fled on foot. Police allege they saw the victim attempt to carjack another vehicle with a gun. Police then shot and killed the victim.

properties.name: Name Withheld
properties.circumstances: Police were called after a domestic assault with a gun. Arriving officers allegedly arrived to encounter a barricaded suspect with a hostage. After an extended standoff where teargas was used, the victim allegedly walked out of house and pointed gun at officers, one of which fired a shot that killed victim.

properties.name: Orlando D. Harris
properties.circumstances: Victim was a former student who illegally entered the school and began shooting at people. Police arrived and shot victim, killing him.

properties.name: Lynn Fredericksen
properties.circumstances: Officers responded to a domestic violence call. Police allege when they arrived, they found the victim inside the home covered in blood and holding a knife. Police allege the victim threatened officers with the knife who then shot and killed him.

properties.name: Justin Harrod
properties.circumstances: Police responded to a call about a man with a gun. There had been a domestic argument where the caller had left the home after the husband grabbed a gun, and  later heard a gunshot and was concerned. Police located and engaged the victim, who would not cooperate with requests. Deputies then shot and killed him.

properties.name: Jose C. Jimenez
properties.circumstances: Officers were responding to a 911 call regarding a weapons violation. Responding deputies searching for the suspect made contact with the victim and then shot and killed him.

properties.name: Ronnie Lee Martin
properties.circumstances: An alert for a kidnapped woman went out from KY.  Tag reader identified the suspects car in MS.  Police pursued the car until it crashed.  The victim allegedly ran from the car armed and police shot him.

properties.name: Desman LaDuke
properties.circumstances: Police responded to a call of the victim in a mental health crisis. When police arrive, they allege the victim was armed. Police allege the victim pointed a gun at police, who then shot and killed the victim.

properties.name: Christopher David Roldan
properties.circumstances: Police attempted a traffic to stop on a vehicle being tracked for a drug investigation. The vehicle allegedly failed to stop and the driver was eluding deputies, with deputies eventually stopping the car with a PIT maneuver. The victim driver then allegedly exited the car and refused to follow verbal commands from deputies and began approaching them with a knife when police shot the victim and then struck him with his rifle when he attempted to rise from the ground.

properties.name: Luis Alfredo Ferro-Sanchez
